类 VideoSocketHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
com.shiroha.socketapi.handler.VideoSocketHandler
所有已实现的接口:
org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
@Component @ControllerAdvice public class VideoSocketHandler extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
客户端上传视频，服务端回传手语识别结果和语音播报
